mintydocs-noparentpage: Error: Every $1 page must be a subpage.
mintydocs-invalidparentpage: Error: The page "$1" must be a $2 page.
mintydocs-product-versionlist: Click on any of the following to see the documentation for that version:
mintydocs-version-desc: This is the documentation for version $1 of $2.
mintydocs-version-manuallist: Here are the manuals for this version:
mintydocs-manual-desc: This manual is for version $1 of $2.
mintydocs-manual-otherversions: Read this manual for other versions:
mintydocs-topic-desc: This topic is part of the manual $1 for version $2 of $3.
mintydocs-topic-otherversions: Read this topic for other versions:
